items.title: AI Tool Rapidly Flags Patients Ineligible for Thrombolysis
items.description: A large language model identified patients ineligible for thrombolysis with nearly 95% sensitivity. Medscape Medical News

items.title: VTE During Pancreatic Cancer Care Linked to Worse Survival

items.title: When Cancer Is Missed in Learning Disability Care
items.description: Missed warning signs and communication barriers mean cancer is often diagnosed late in people with learning disabilities. Medscape News UK

items.title: More Older Adults to Get RSV Vaccine During April
items.description: During April, adults aged 80 and over and care home residents in England will be offered RSV vaccination, alongside eligibility for 75-year-olds. Meds...

items.title: Higher Rates of EOE, Food Allergy Mostly in White Male Teens
items.description: Better adherence to guidelines for food allergen introduction to infants may improve incidence of EoE and food allergy. Medscape Medical News
